newsitem.title: CANADA: Avenor makes stock bid for Repap.
newsitem.headline: Avenor makes stock bid for Repap.

text.p: Avenor Inc said on Wednesday it made an all-stock bid for Repap Enterprises Inc and that Repap's board of directors had accepted the offer.
Avenor offered to buy out Repap by exchanging one newly issued Avenor common share for 4.25 shares of Repap.
Under the terms of the offer Repap Chairman and Chief Executive Officer George Petty has committed to vote his 23 percent share in the company in favor of the deal.
Completion of the deal, subject to shareholder and regulatory approval, is expected by February 28, 1997.
Avenor also said it would suspend its dividend.
